channel.title: Effect when program unloads
channel.description:
Put this anywhere
Private Sub Form_Unload(Cancel As Integer) On Error Resume Next Do Me.Top = Me.Top + 30 Me.Left = Me.Left + 30 Me.Width = Me.Width - 60 Me.Height = Me.Height - 60 Loop Until Me.Top > Screen.Width End End Sub

item.title: Effect when program unloads
item.dc:creator: @hellou hellou
item.description:
@hellou wrote:

Put this anywhere

Private Sub Form_Unload(Cancel As Integer)
On Error Resume Next
Do
Me.Top = Me.Top + 30
Me.Left = Me.Left + 30
Me.Width = Me.Width - 60
Me.Height = Me.Height - 60
Loop Until Me.Top > Screen.Width
End
End Sub

Read full topic
